name: checkov
description: Checkov scans cloud infrastructure configurations for issues

params.name: workingDirectory
params.description: A directory on the Kaholo agent containing the IaC code to scan, either absolute or relative path

params.name: targetFileOrDirectory
params.description: Optional specific file or directory within working directory to scan (-d or -f)
params.placeholder: leave empty to scan whole working directory

params.name: checksToSkip
params.description: A list of checks to skip, one per line (--skip-check)

params.name: environmentVariables
params.description: one-per-line Key=Value pairs, to be set as environment variables in Checkov's environment

params.name: secretEnvVars
params.description: One-per-line Key=Value pairs stored as a Kaholo Vault item, to be set as environment variables in Checkov's environment

params.name: jsonOutput
params.description: Return Final Result in JSON format (-o json).

params.name: additionalArguments
params.description: Add any additional arguments to the command, one per line.

params.name: dockerImage
params.description: Specify which Checkov docker repo/image:tag to use.
